errors.missingArgument: Missing argument, the `{0}` argument is required!
errors.missingPermission: Missing permission, the `{0}` permission is required!
errors.invalidProperty: Invalid `{0}` provided, you must provide a valid {1}.
errors.noChannelsWithNameOrId: I found no channels with the name or ID of `{0}`.
errors.noUsersWithNameOrId: I found no users with the name or ID of `{0}`.
errors.noRolesWithNameOrId: I found no roles with the name or ID of `{0}`.
errors.errorOccurredWhileLoading: An error occurred while loading the {0}, please try again. If the problem continues, please report this to one of my developers on the [support server](https://discord.gg/eVCGeCP)

AvatarCommand.description: Get the profile picture of someone on the server by id, mention or your default.

BanCommand.description: Ban or unban a group of identifiers for the guild.

ChannelCommand.description: Get information about the channel by mention, identifier or name of channel.

ClearCommand.description: Deletes the specified number of messages.
ClearCommand.tryingToExceedLimit: You can delete strictly from `1` to `100` messages at a time.

EmojiCommand.description: Get information about the specified emoji by name or id, or a list of all custom emoji.
EmojiCommand.nameIsShort: Emoji name cannot be less than 2 characters.
EmojiCommand.failedToFindEmoji: Failed to find emoji with name or id `{0}`.
EmojiCommand.noEmojis: There are no custom emojis on this server.

embed.title: List of all custom emojis from `:name`.

FeedbackCommand.description: Send feedback about Misa back to the developers and the staff team.
FeedbackCommand.invalidFeedbackChannel: Invalid feedback channel defined, the text channel could not be found!
FeedbackCommand.mustBe32CharactersOrMore: The feedback message must be at least 32 characters long.

HelpCommand.description: Provides a list of commands and what they do, and how you can use them.
HelpCommand.failedToFindCommand: Failed to find command with name of `{0}`.

embed.menuDescription:
**» Help menu**
We have `:commandsCount` commands to explore.
The current prefix is `:prefix`.

**» Commands list**
:commands

**» Useful links**
:links

LanguageCommand.description: Show a list of available languages or set a language that should be used for the server.
LanguageCommand.invalidLanguageCode: Invalid language code given, `{0}` is not a valid language code, or it is not yet supported.
LanguageCommand.changed: The server's language has been successfully been updated to use the `:name` language!

LogChannelCommand.description: Set mention a text channel to logging in the mentioned channel.
LogChannelCommand.changed: The server's log channel id has been successfully been updated to `:name` channel!

PrefixCommand.description: Change the command prefix for the server.
PrefixCommand.invalidPrefix: Invalid command prefix given, `{0}` is not a valid command prefix.
PrefixCommand.changed: The server's command prefix has been successfully been updated to use the `:prefix` prefix!

embed.description: Use `:prefix` this is the current command prefix for this server.

RoleCommand.description: Get information about specified role by mention, identifier or name of role.

UserCommand.description: Get information about specified user by mention or identifier of user.
